definitions.definition: A gastrointestinal disorder characterized by frequent and very fluid or watery bowel movements.
The watery or very soft excrement that comes from such bowel movements.
Solid excretory product evacuated from the bowels; feces.

definitions.example: Can't a guy take a shit in peace?
Fuck it. I don't feel like doing this shit.

definitions.definition: (definite) (the shit) The best of its kind.

definitions.example: Everything he says is a load of shit.

definitions.definition: A nasty, despicable person, used particularly of men.
definitions.example: Her son has been a real shit to her.
John can't sing for shit. = John can't sing for anything. = John can't sing at all.
I gave him shit for being three hours late twice in one week.

definitions.definition: To fool or try to fool someone; to be deceitful.
definitions.example: Twelve hundred dollars!? Are you shitting me!?
That ad shits me to tears.
